name: This War of Ours (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: This War of Ours (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
By Leo L., Selina Z., and H. Chen

In the classroom of Class 2 Grade 8, three young boys are
simultaneously wooing their pretty cute classmate—Sarah, who
unfortunately got a fever…. SO!!! It’s their best chance to win the affection
from Sarah and outlast the others, by texting to her and comforting her!
However, Mrs. Gazina is in charge of the self-study class that day. The boys
have to evade from her sight….

Instruction:

The players are to win Sarah's heart by texting 200 times, or being the last one whose cellphone is still on his hand!

Player Alex: Press [A] to text.
Player George: Press [G] to text.
Player Leo: Press [L] to text.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
